bridge.ui.common_window.author: bridge. Team
bridge.ui.common_window.name: Bridge CommonWindow
bridge.ui.common_window.description: Utility for other plugins. Wraps the bridge. Window API into an easier to use class.

bridge.ui.confirm_window.author: bridge. Team
bridge.ui.confirm_window.name: Bridge ConfirmWindow
bridge.ui.confirm_window.description: Utility for other plugins. Uses bridge.ui.common_window to construct a confirm dialog.

solved.features.dynamic_json.author: solvedDev
solved.features.dynamic_json.name: Dynamic JSON
solved.features.dynamic_json.description: A compiler which can speed up creating repetitive JSON by writing loop statements and shared data inside the new "variables" state.

solved.features.dynamic_function.author: solvedDev
solved.features.dynamic_function.name: Dynamic Function
solved.features.dynamic_function.description: Adds the new /dynamicfunction & /func command which can be used to pass arguments to a .mcfunction file.

solved.utilities.bridge_plugin_creator.author: bridge. Team
solved.utilities.bridge_plugin_creator.name: Bridge Plugin Creator
solved.utilities.bridge_plugin_creator.description: Adds bridge. plugin files to bridge.'s native file creation window.

solved.utilities.console.name: Console
solved.utilities.console.author: solvedDev
solved.utilities.console.description: Utility module to bring a console to bridge. plugins.

solved.utilities.crash_overview.name: Crash Indicator
solved.utilities.crash_overview.author: solvedDev
solved.utilities.crash_overview.description: Displays which entities may cause crashes.

solved.utilities.file_search.name: File Search
solved.utilities.file_search.author: solvedDev
solved.utilities.file_search.description: Quickly search all files of a project for specific keywords.
